contents.text: Welcome to Teamable in San Francisco, where our employee referral program can drive up to forty percent of your hiring pipeline.
For sales and to request a demo of Teamable's referral solution, press 1.
To schedule a personalized demo of Teamable, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Teamable product specialist.

navigationGoals: Schedule a quick, personalized demo of Teamable's referral platform
I’d like to set up a personalized demo of your employee referral platform to help me recruit fellow veterans.
Schedule a deep-dive demo of Teamable's employee referral platform.
I need help scheduling a personalized demo of your employee referral platform.
I’d like to book a personalized demo of Teamable’s referral platform for my physics student organization.

contents.text: For pricing and licensing details, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our pricing team.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and licensing information for Teamable
I need detailed pricing and licensing information for your referral software as I plan my nonprofit’s hiring budget.
Obtain detailed pricing tiers and licensing info for Teamable's referral solution.
I’d like to get pricing and licensing information for your referral solution.
I need detailed pricing and licensing information for Teamable for our student research group.

contents.text: For customer support and account inquiries, press 2.
For technical assistance with the Teamable platform, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Fix a technical issue I'm having with the Teamable platform
I’m having trouble accessing my Teamable dashboard and need technical support to troubleshoot my login.
Resolve technical integration issues with the Teamable API.
I’m having technical issues with the Teamable platform and need assistance.
I’m encountering an error when importing contacts into Teamable and need technical support.

contents.text: For account and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to your account management team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing question on my Teamable account
I need to review my current invoice and billing details for my Teamable account.
Clarify billing charges and account management settings on my Teamable account.
I have a billing question about my account and need someone to explain my invoice.
I want to review my Teamable account billing statement and update the payment method.
